pr_title: Allow registering ContextStorage wrappers with code to avoid requirin…

timeline.message: Allow registering ContextStorage wrappers with code to avoid requiring SPI for listening to events.

timeline.bodyText: It probably doesn't matter too much, since this class isn't public, but exposing synchronized methods is generally a bad practice, as it could allow accidental deadlocking if someone synchronizes on this class.
timeline.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: Yeah figured it's ok due to the privateness but went with consistency.
replies.author: anuraaga
